title: 08/09/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 08/09/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Doug Gottlieb filling in for Colin breaks down the big Josh Allen contract and what it means for the rest of the 2018 Draft Class. The 49er’s quarterback situation seems to have no obvious leader since Jimmy G. might not be with the team long term. Plus, Doug Whaley former General Manager for the Buffalo Bills stops by for all the happenings and insight in the NFL!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
